citation.abstract: Jurassic World is opening in cinemas this Thursday and again raises the idea of resurrecting extinct creatures. But there's plenty of other contenders before we even think of recreating dinosaurs.

blogs.title: Sorry, Jurassic Park fans: Scientists focusing de-extinction genetics on saving living species
blogs.summary:
De-extinction is based on the concept that extinction need not be forever. One way to save those animals and plants that we thought were already lost is via genomic techniques, which can link molecular biology and conservation.
